vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐλμαδάμ (L, Ἑλ-; Rec. -μωδάμ), ό, indecl.,
Elmadam, an ancestor of Jesus: Luk.3:28.
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.28;
son of: Er (G2262);
father of: Cosam (G2973)
§ also spelled Ἐλμωδάμ, Elmadam, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:28*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以摩當 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "量器"
珥的兒子,耶穌的宗譜中的一位祖先, #路 3:28|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以摩当 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "量器"
珥的儿子,耶稣的宗谱中的一位祖先, #路 3:28|
